xyz.fsgik.common.net.tcp

接口 FsTcpChannel


  • @ThreadSafe
public interface FsTcpChannel
    This class represents a TCP/IP connection channel between local and remote endpoint.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 默认方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      default void close()
      Closes this channel, blocks current thread for buffered operations.
      void close(@Nullable java.time.Duration timeout)
      Closes this channel, blocks current thread for buffered operations in given timeout.
      void closeNow()
      Closes this channel immediately, without blocking and buffered operations.
      void flush()
      Flushes buffered data to be written to remote endpoint.
      java.net.InetAddress getLocalAddress()
      Returns address of local endpoint.
      int getLocalPort()
      Returns port of remote endpoint.
      java.net.SocketAddress getLocalSocketAddress()
      Returns socket address of local endpoint.
      java.net.InetAddress getRemoteAddress()
      Returns address of remote endpoint.
      int getRemotePort()
      Returns port of remote endpoint.
      java.net.SocketAddress getRemoteSocketAddress()
      Returns socket address of remote endpoint.
      java.lang.Object getSource()
      Returns underlying object which implements FsTcpChannel interface, such as Socket.
      boolean isClosed()
      Returns whether this channel is closed.
      boolean isOpened()
      Returns whether this channel is opened.
      void send(byte[] data)
      Sends data to remote endpoint.
      void send(byte[] data, int offset, int length)
      Sends data of specified length from given offset to remote endpoint.
      void send(java.nio.ByteBuffer data)
      Sends data to remote endpoint.
      void send(FsData data)
      Sends data to remote endpoint.
      void send(java.io.InputStream data)
      Sends data to remote endpoint.
      default void sendAndFlush(byte[] data)
      Sends data to remote endpoint and flushes immediately.
      default void sendAndFlush(byte[] data, int offset, int length)
      Sends data of specified length from given offset to remote endpoint and flushes immediately.
      default void sendAndFlush(java.nio.ByteBuffer data)
      Sends data to remote endpoint and flushes immediately.
      default void sendAndFlush(FsData data)
      Sends data to remote endpoint and flushes immediately.
      default void sendAndFlush(java.io.InputStream data)
      Sends data to remote endpoint and flushes immediately.

    • 方法详细资料

      • getRemoteAddress

        java.net.InetAddress getRemoteAddress()
        Returns address of remote endpoint.
        返回:
        address of remote endpoint

      • getRemotePort

        int getRemotePort()
        Returns port of remote endpoint.
        返回:
        port of remote endpoint

      • getLocalAddress

        java.net.InetAddress getLocalAddress()
        Returns address of local endpoint.
        返回:
        address of local endpoint

      • getLocalPort

        int getLocalPort()
        Returns port of remote endpoint.
        返回:
        port of local endpoint

      • getRemoteSocketAddress

        java.net.SocketAddress getRemoteSocketAddress()
        Returns socket address of remote endpoint.
        返回:
        socket address of remote endpoint

      • getLocalSocketAddress

        java.net.SocketAddress getLocalSocketAddress()
        Returns socket address of local endpoint.
        返回:
        socket address of local endpoint

      • isOpened

        boolean isOpened()
        Returns whether this channel is opened.
        返回:
        whether this channel is opened

      • isClosed

        boolean isClosed()
        Returns whether this channel is closed.
        返回:
        whether this channel is closed

      • close

        default void close()
        Closes this channel, blocks current thread for buffered operations.

      • close

        void close(@Nullable
           @Nullable java.time.Duration timeout)
        Closes this channel, blocks current thread for buffered operations in given timeout.
        参数:
        timeout - given timeout, maybe null to always wait

      • closeNow

        void closeNow()
        Closes this channel immediately, without blocking and buffered operations.

      • send

        void send(FsData data)
        Sends data to remote endpoint. The written data may be buffered before the flush() is called.
        参数:
        data - the data

      • send

        void send(byte[] data)
        Sends data to remote endpoint. The written data may be buffered before the flush() is called.
        参数:
        data - the data

      • send

        void send(byte[] data,
          int offset,
          int length)
        Sends data of specified length from given offset to remote endpoint. The written data may be buffered before the flush() is called.
        参数:
        data - the data
        offset - given offset
        length - specified length

      • send

        void send(java.nio.ByteBuffer data)
        Sends data to remote endpoint. The written data may be buffered before the flush() is called.
        参数:
        data - the data

      • send

        void send(java.io.InputStream data)
        Sends data to remote endpoint. The written data may be buffered before the flush() is called.
        参数:
        data - the data

      • sendAndFlush

        default void sendAndFlush(FsData data)
        Sends data to remote endpoint and flushes immediately.
        参数:
        data - the data

      • sendAndFlush

        default void sendAndFlush(byte[] data)
        Sends data to remote endpoint and flushes immediately.
        参数:
        data - the data

      • sendAndFlush

        default void sendAndFlush(byte[] data,
                          int offset,
                          int length)
        Sends data of specified length from given offset to remote endpoint and flushes immediately.
        参数:
        data - the data
        offset - given offset
        length - specified length

      • sendAndFlush

        default void sendAndFlush(java.nio.ByteBuffer data)
        Sends data to remote endpoint and flushes immediately.
        参数:
        data - the data

      • sendAndFlush

        default void sendAndFlush(java.io.InputStream data)
        Sends data to remote endpoint and flushes immediately.
        参数:
        data - the data

      • flush

        void flush()
        Flushes buffered data to be written to remote endpoint.

      • getSource

        java.lang.Object getSource()
        Returns underlying object which implements FsTcpChannel interface, such as Socket.
        返回:
        underlying object
